document.full_text: connecticut overcame a sub-par performance by all-america guard kemba walker with an inspired second-half rally to defeat butler 53-41 monday and win the ncaa basketball tournament for the third time.
document.title: connecticut defeats butler to win ncaa title
lines_and_colors: connecticut overcame a sub-par performance by all-america guard kemba walker with an inspired second-half rally to defeat butler 53-41 monday and win the ncaa basketball tournament for the third time.
